p: The effect of the intervention on population-level HIV incidence was measured in a Population Cohort (PC) (enrolled December 2013-March 2015) that included one randomly-selected adult aged 18-44 years from a random sample of households in each community (Figure S4). PC participants were surveyed at baseline (PC0) and after 12, 24 and 36 months (PC12/PC24/PC36).
